title: Top main LF team
body:
Hey guys, I'm currently looking for a team to join that will be semi serious. I am currently bronze 4 but last season I reached silver 1, and I also have quite a large champion pool and I'm willing to play champions that the team needs me to play.

If you want me to join the team then add me in game (also I have a working microphone so if we are using a communication program that wont be a issue)

replies.body: Add me. I'm a bronze 4 I was also silver last season
Hi, i'm currently bronze 4 also and peaked b1 last season and silver 3 the season beforehand, i'm interested :) please add me ingame. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
